Package com.tsgrp.migration.connect

The connect package.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Connection
    Connection interface: every Connection must implement Connection.isConnected(), and most will avail themselves of the "dynabean-like" capability of the Connection.getAttr(String), Connection.setAttr(String, Object) and Connection.reset() methods implemented in the AbstractConnector class.
    Connector
    Connection Factory interface: every Connector must implement #newConnection() and Connector.disconnect(Connection).
    FileStoreConnection
    This interface provides methods to manipulate a file or folder that can be implemented through different connection objects.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractConnection
    Define the basic dynabean-like functionality of a Connection.
    AbstractConnector
    Define any common behaviors (if any) across all Connector instances.
    EncryptedBasicDataSource  
    EncryptedSingleConnectionDataSource  
    ExcelConnection  
    ExcelConnector  
    FileConnection
    This implementation of FileStoreConnection provides all the necessary methods to process files and folders, much the same way java.io allows.
    FileConnector
    This simple connector, by default, returns a new empty SimpleConnection with each call to #newConnection(); but if a "singleton" Connection is injected, that instance is returned each time.
    JdbcConnection
    Holds a DataSource and JdbcTemplate for use by a single thread.
    JdbcConnector
    Return a new JdbcConnection object with each call to newConnection, each with the same DataSource (which could be a connection pool or a simpler data source) but a new JdbcTemplate.
    SFTPConnection  
    SFTPConnector  
    SimpleConnection
    This minimal implementation of Connection implements a simple isConnected property, accessible from without, in order to provide a very lightweight connection (e.g., for file system only migrations).
    SimpleConnector
    This simple connector, by default, returns a new empty SimpleConnection with each call to #newConnection(); but if a "singleton" Connection is injected, that instance is returned each time.
    StoreBean
    Represent a single Store, either File Store or CA Store; used by the Documentum Connection to represent a store within a cached collection of them.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ConnectionException
    Connection Exceptions.

Package com.tsgrp.migration.connect Description

The connect package.
